title: Revolution reverberation
author: VD
content_html:
Presidential candidate Ron Paul raised almost $20 million for his campaign in the last three months, potentially outpacing every one of his Republican rivals and putting his fundraising in league with Hillary Clinton’s….The take puts Paul on par with the top fundraisers in the Democratic Party, who outpaced Republicans last year. The campaign of New York Senator Clinton yesterday said she raised more than $100 million for the year, meaning she brought in at least $20 million in the fourth quarter.

Soon we’ll see if it’s the fund-raising or the interminable telephone polls that are more reliable. For those who trust in the latter, remind me who that eminently electable front-runner is again… it’s Giuliani, right?
content_text:
Presidential candidate Ron Paul
raised almost $20 million
for his campaign in the last three months, potentially outpacing every one of his Republican rivals and putting his fundraising in league with Hillary Clinton’s….The take puts Paul on par with the top fundraisers in the Democratic Party, who outpaced Republicans last year. The campaign of New York Senator Clinton yesterday said she raised more than $100 million for the year, meaning she brought in at least $20 million in the fourth quarter.
Soon we’ll see if it’s the fund-raising or the interminable telephone polls that are more reliable.  For those who trust in the latter, remind me who that eminently electable front-runner is again… it’s Giuliani, right?
